key_risks: Technological risks due to unproven commercial viability of Direct Lithium Extraction (DLE) technology
Market volatility affecting lithium prices and profitability
Regulatory and permitting hurdles potentially delaying project timelines
Funding dependencies on capital markets and strategic investments
controversies: Environmental concerns over water usage and broader impact of brine extraction
Potential delays in regulatory approvals for the Clearwater Project
environmental_issues: Water usage and environmental impact of brine extraction
Reliance on untested advanced filtration and membrane technologies at commercial scale
governance_issues: Execution risk related to proprietary extraction methods
